Content:: Henk Leeuwis (4 December 1945 – 19 July 2022), known as Henkie, was a Dutch singer. Born in Elst, Netherlands, he was famous for his 2006 Belgian chart-topper "Lief Klein Konijntje"[1] and the 2007 single "Mijn Goudvis".[2] Henkie died on 19 July 2022, at the age of 77.[3]
Title: Henkie - Wikipedia
